name: Historical Archaeological Bagura

name: Dhaka City Tour
description: We start this tour any time of the day and the duration will be 6 to 7 hours. Tour guide will pick you up from your nominated place / hotel and the tour will move through the destinations below:

name: Shitalakhya River
description: Guide will pick you up from your nominated place at 9 a.m. and will start for Demra ghat where our boat will be waiting for you. It will take 45 minutes to reach the boat at river shitalakhya.

description: Guide will pick you up from your nominated place at 9 a.m. and will start for Demra ghat where our boat will be waiting for you. It will take 45 minutes to reach the boat at river shitalakhya.

name: Switzerland & France Tour
description: Seven nights and eight days long tour in Switzerland and France. After flying from Bangladesh, this journey starts in Paris. Visitors will experience a day tour of Paris, a full-day tour of Lucerne, a full day of sightseeing in Zurich, a full day of adventure in Interlaken, and a full day of shopping. They will also view the Eiffel Tower and Mount Titlis.

name: Hello Maldives
description: This hello Maldives tour package includes 4 days and 3 nights. The package provides daily breakfast, Island transfer by SIC speedboat/ferry shuttle basis, Hotel room double/single as per the hotel's category, and airport pick and drop transfers on a private basis. The Maldives is a wonderful place. The Maldives provides a wonderful feeling for a horse in the middle of the ocean.

name: Nepal Tour 5 Days
description: This Nepal tour package includes 5 days and 4 nights. It includes daily breakfast, 02 nights of accommodation on Dom Himalaya or similar at Kathmandu, and 2 nights of accommodation at Hotel Iceland with a swimming pool, lakeside, or similar at Pokhara. Nepal is a very beautiful place in Asia. Nepal is famous for its mountains. The climate of Nepal is very similar to that of Bangladesh and that is why Bengalis like Nepals very much.

name: Singapore for 4 Night
description: Dhaka-Singapore-Dhaka 5 days and 4 nights package holiday. This package includes breakfast but lunch and dinner are not included. This package does not include a visa fee, its optional,
